metadata.title: CVE-2017-15107 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in the implementation of DNSSEC in Dnsmasq up toand including 2.78. Wildcard synthesized NSEC records could be improperlyinterpreted to prove the non-existence of hostnames that actually exist.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsmasq - 2.79-1
dnsmasq-base - 2.79-1
dnsmasq-base-lua - 2.79-1
dnsmasq-utils - 2.79-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dnsmasq package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.79-1').
